dsOverview.title: NCEP/DOE Reanalysis 2 Monthly Means

summary.p: The monthly means of 6 hourly NCEP/DOE Reanalysis 2 data, archived in ds091.0 dataset, are archived in this dataset. The data files are in WMO GRIB format.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NWS/NCEP/CPC > Climate Prediction Center, National Centers for Environmental Prediction, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
